text:
="preserve">Tadeusz Szelachowski (7 April 1932 – 9 September 2020) was a Polish physician and politician. He was born in Sielachowskie, Poland. From 1981 to 1985, he was Minister of Health. Between 1985 to 1989, he was a member of Sejm.
Szelachowski died on 9 September 2020 in Warsaw, aged 88.
